scripts.start: npm run build:happ && cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ" "npm run start:ui"
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate ./workdir/provider_applet-applet.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a provider_applet-applet network mdns
scripts.build: rimraf out-tsc && rimraf dist && rimraf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && tsc && rollup --config rollup.config.js
scripts.package: npm run package:ui && hc web-app pack ./workdir
scripts.package:ui: rimraf ui.zip && npm run build && cd ./dist && bestzip ../ui.zip *.js icon.png
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./workdir
